sentences.english: A common vocabulary or common understanding can help all in communications.

sentences.english: The OLC (Omni-directional luminance control ) provides excellent even lighting without glare.
sentences.chinese: 全方位反射，配光均勻，無眩光。

sentences.english: Media industrialization is a omni-directional change.
sentences.chinese: 媒體產業化是一次全方位的變革。

sentences.english: Over these past decades, China has transformed itself totally.
sentences.chinese: 在過去的數十年中，中國進行了全方位的改革轉型。

sentences.english: The test covers the whole spectrum of ability.

sentences.english: On one hand purchaser cannot all-around understanding goods news.

sentences.english: Fourthly, to break the blockade from the all-round opening up.

sentences.english: A pattern of all-around and multi-level international S&T cooperation has basically taken shape.

sentences.english: Currently Cambodia-China cooperation in all areas is well underway and is developing in an all-round manner.

sentences.english: The movie line is a full line. The line for the movie will be broad and have multiple scales.

sentences.english: It has preliminary formed economic patterns of opening to the out -side …

sentences.english: The home is warmer, which has the omni- directional enhancement.

sentences.english: The integration can build the omni-directional learning environment for the students.
